summary: This documentary follows the 2002 mayoral campaign in Newark, New Jersey in which a City Councilman, Cory Booker, attempted to unseat longtime mayor Sharpe James.
cast: Jen Bluestein|Cory Booker|Bill Bradley|Chris Christie|Pablo Fonseca|Sharpe James|Spike Lee|Jim McGreevey|Al Sharpton|Cornel West
keywords: powerful enemy|new jersey|common good|fight for justice|political reform
title: Street Fight
